Quickstrike/Rowdy Wolf:





Quickstrike grabbed Stingtra's leg, holding her tight, with a look on his 
face that read: Get me out of here! He stared in panic at the Metal Beast 
that stepped closer to them. It stared at Stingtra and brought two massive 
cannons from it shoulders to her.


Rowdy Wolf's eyes grew large as he saw the metal wolf-like creature and 
Stingtrra have their stand-off. He saw Quickstrike on the ground, possibly 
damaged. He charged out into section of the cavern as soon as Terrorsaur 
took off into the air.
